General.Name: Standard Uranium Ltd.
General.Description: Standard Uranium Ltd., an exploration stage company, acquires, evaluates, and develops uranium properties in Canada. Its flagship property is the Davidson River Project, which comprise 21 mineral claims covering an area of approximately 25,886 hectares located in the southwest part of the Athabasca Basin, Saskatchewan. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 550 Denman Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6G 3H1

1.Name: Mr. Martin  Bajic B.A., BA, C.A., CPA, CA
